profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday February 5, 2019 at 01:25

did.unittitle: Berliner Gramophone Disc Collection
did.physdesc: 17 Boxes. Berliner Gramophone Discs. All discs are 7 inch in diameter except where noted.
